import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function Register(){ let styleRegisterFormContainer = { marginTop: '10em', marginLeft: '15%', marginRight: '15%', paddingBottom: '5em', textAlign: 'center', background: 'white', boxShadow: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35) 0px 5px 15px', borderRadius: '1.5em' } let inputTextPassword = { width: '50%', height: '2em', marginBottom: '1em', border: '1px solid #294780', borderRadius: '0.3em' } let inputFLNames = { width: '46.4%', height: '2em', marginBottom: '1em', marginRight: '0.5em', border: '1px solid #294780', borderRadius: '0.3em' } let registerBtn = { /*#335eb0*/ background: '#294780', fontSize: '1em', border: '0.5em solid #294780', borderRadius: '0.3em', marginTop: '1.5em', color: 'white' } let formsStyle = { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'spaceBetween', alignItems: 'center', } return( <>

A hangout area for Section 48

Sign Up

Have an account already? Log in
); } export default Register;
